thread.title: 29 Awesomely Gay Pictures Of LGBT People As Kids
thread.title_full: 29 Awesomely Gay Pictures Of LGBT People As Kids

author: Matt Stopera
title: 29 Awesomely Gay Pictures Of LGBT People As Kids
text:
View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251226 2. “Over it.” —Eric Dimitratos, Facebook View this image ›
Facebook ID: 10253416 3. “Wait, make sure you get my good side.” — bryboutillier View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251246 4. “Blue satin shorts and my homemade Easter bonnet for school… ‘nuff said lol.” — michaelchadfrazier View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251157 5. “I have always been such a little lesbian. Look at those keys dangling from my jeans!” — brittanyw13 View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251165 6. “I tried so hard to be girly, to fit into the right mold. I wanted so badly to do everything by the book, to make my mom proud… But who I was was always painfully obvious.” — alishan4d273bd20 View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251185 7. “I was very excited to sit on Smurfette’s lap…” — jamiev424c94b8b View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251197 8. “Mum’s heels were always my favorites to be fair. The thigh-high boots were better but no one ever photographed them. Sob.” —Jamie Mountain, Facebook View this image ›
Facebook ID: 10251201 9. “#Fashion” —Evan Palmer, Facebook View this image ›
Facebook ID: 10251219 10. “I’m at a Revolutionary War fort hanging off the arm of a shirtless man mannequin giving serious face. Iconic.” —Matt Stopera, BuzzFeed View this image ›
Matt Stopera/BuzzFeed ID: 10251221 “I know this is just a Quote: but come on!” —Matt Stopera, BuzzFeed View this image ›
Matt Stopera/BuzzFeed ID: 10251233 11. “Nobody seemed too surprised when I said, ‘Hey, by the way, I like girls and always have.’ I’ve always been a tomboy.” — alimonster00 View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251174 12. “Age 12, dressed as Christina Aguilera for a remake of the Moulin Rouge soundtrack ‘Lady Marmalade’ music video, filmed by my sister.” —Ross Oviatt, Facebook View this image ›
Facebook ID: 10253411 13. “Homemade drag 1984 cause I wasn’t allowed to wear woman’s clothing. I made it from an apron + table cloth.” —Luke Frew, Facebook View this image ›
Facebook ID: 10253417 14. “Striking a pose while our house was being built. My parents were supposedly surprised when I came out…” —Jeffrey Glitt, Facebook View this image ›
Facebook ID: 10253421 15. “Age 3, stomping around in my dad’s boots because #fashion.” —Roux Patterson, Facebook View this image ›
Facebook ID: 10253424 16. “When I was in preschool I was a huge fan of the dress-up box. When asked what I want to be when I grow up, I would reply ‘a lady.’” —Jordan Horsefeathers, Facebook View this image ›
Facebook ID: 10253418 17. “The flannel, the sunglasses, my brother’s shoes, and my dad’s hat.” — valb4d3667845 View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251239 18. “I’ll just leave this fashion moment right here.” —Mikey Qi, Facebook View this image ›
Facebook ID: 10251244 19. “One-year-old. #babybutch #forever.” — kiaraj92 View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251251 20. “Strike a pose, there’s nothing to it.” —Andres Zapata, Facebook View this image ›
Facebook ID: 10251254 21. “Yep, pretty much an early member of the F.L.A. (Future Lesbians of America).” — dbesson View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251259 22. “My dad was the coach, my brother was first in line. I was the one-man cheerleading team.” — tavilla View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251272 23. “I wanted that Barbie camper so bad! My dad spent two hours putting all the stickers on.” — coryg4124532c6 View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251275 24. “I wanted to be a cowboy that saved people and I refused to wear my dress. I’ve been with my girlfriend for almost a year, and she still laughs at this picture.” — calliewhatever View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251283 25. “My mini lezzie self was all business in the front and party in the back! And no butch would be complete without a workout panda shirt!” — amandab225 View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251286 26. “Boxing gloves absolutely untouched. Disco station used for spinning Kylie Minogue records until it fell apart.” — wilsonkelvinm View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251291 27. “I lived in England for a summer when I was 5, and I would insist on dressing as Robin Hood EVERY. SINGLE. DAY. In the end, no one was shocked that I’d rather rescue and marry the beautiful princess than BE the beautiful princess.” — amandabreich View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251295 28. “This was taken when I was about 10 and somehow my family was still surprised when I came out at 21.” — peytona3 View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251298 29. “Striking a pose since I was 2.” — alonsierra View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10251303 Want to be featured on BuzzFeed? Follow the BuzzFeed Community on Facebook and Twitter ! ID: 10251307 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
Deputy Editorial Director, Devout Member of the Church of Godney Contact Matt Stopera at matt.stopera@buzzfeed.com .
